naslov: Lokva Rogoznica - kuća s 3 apartmana i s pogledom na more (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo pri prodaji apartmanske kuće nedaleko od Omiša, u mjestu Lokva Rogoznica. Kuća je udaljena svega 5 minuta hoda do plaže, a raspoređena je  na 3 etaže: prizemlje + 2 kata. Na prvom i drugom katu se nalazi kuhinja s blagovaonom, dnevnim boravkom, prostranim kupatilom, spavaćom sobom i balkonom s otvorenim pogledom na more., dok je u  prizemlju isti raspored uz dodatnu radnu sobu. Pored navedenog prizemlju pripada i lijep vrt u kojem se nalazi roštilj. Sva tri stana su klimatizirana, nedavno adaptirana i pripremljena za turističko iznajmljivanje. Sadašnji vlasnici su za apartmane dobili kategorizaciju sa 4 zvjezdice. Uz sve navedeno kuća ima i 2 vanjska parkirna mjesta. --- We are mediating the sale of an apartment house located near Omiš, in the village of Lokva Rogoznica. The house is just a 5-minute walk from the beach and is spread over three levels: ground floor + two upper floors. On the first and second floors, there is a kitchen with a dining area, a living room, a spacious bathroom, a bedroom, and a balcony offering an open sea view. The ground floor has the same layout, with the addition of a study. The ground floor also includes a lovely garden with a barbecue area. All three apartments are air-conditioned, recently renovated, and fully equipped for tourist rental. The current owners have received a 4-star rating for the apartments. In addition, the house comes with two outdoor parking places. .
